pull.title: release note fixups
pull.body:
@laanwj here are some edits to the release notes
I didn't add anything about abandontransaction (maybe it should go in the detailed changes section though) or add clarification in the conflicted section about how this changes whether prevouts are respendable or not.  I think it's fine to leave as is, but just pointing out in case you though otherwise.

events.body:
Great, thanks for taking a look!

ACK 82667af

> maybe it should go in the detailed changes section though

Right. Could you add another commit to do this?

Re: abandontransaction it is already mentioned in the detailed changes:

> - #7312 `fd4bd50` Add RPC call abandontransaction

As I understood it's meant as a mostly hidden feature, to be used if there is another mempool flood / malleation attack, so I think that is mention enough.

Oh sorry, I was looking for it in wallet
No I agree, I think its ok not to draw explicit attention to it
Missed it as well. 82667af looks ready to merge.
